The Boy Who Could Taste Words - A Gastronomic Adventure: In this creative and original story, the boy discovers that he has the unique ability to taste words. He can savor the sweetness of a happy memory, the spiciness of a vivid imagination, and the bitterness of a painful lesson. Along the way, he learns to appreciate the richness of language and the power of words to evoke emotions and create connections.
